DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine effect acute hypnotic intake ( Zolpidem ) sleep , cognitive motor performance acute mountain sickness symptom high altitude . Healthy subject evaluate 4 occasion ( twice sea level twice high altitude ) , hypnotic placebo intake . Following early wake-up ( 01:00 ) , symptom , cognitive motor performance assess determine potential residual effect Zolpidem within condition .
DOC.brief_title: Hypnotic Intake Motor Cognitive Performances High Altitude
DOC.criteria: No sojourn 2500 past 2 month Coffee intake < 3 cup per day Nonsmoker Respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic neuromuscular disease Psychiatric disorder Use hypnotic within past year Dependence syndrome ( alcool , drug , etc ) Severe insomnia somnolence
